classes.description:
Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
See [CSS API](#css) below for more details.

color.description: The color of the component. It supports those theme colors that make sense for this component.

position.description:
The positioning type. The behavior of the different options is described
[in the MDN web docs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/CSS/CSS_layout/Positioning).
Note: `sticky` is not universally supported and will fall back to `static` when unavailable.

descriptions.root: Styles applied to the root element.
descriptions.positionFixed: Styles applied to the root element if `position="fixed"`.
descriptions.positionAbsolute: Styles applied to the root element if `position="absolute"`.
descriptions.positionSticky: Styles applied to the root element if `position="sticky"`.
descriptions.positionStatic: Styles applied to the root element if `position="static"`.
descriptions.positionRelative: Styles applied to the root element if `position="relative"`.
descriptions.colorDefault: Styles applied to the root element if `color="default"`.
descriptions.colorPrimary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="primary"`.
descriptions.colorSecondary: Styles applied to the root element if `color="secondary"`.
